reviews.review_msg: Prof Black is hilarious and spunky. She is a hard marker as she has high expectations for the in-class writings. She's looking for you to use the vocabulary of that you've been taught. For this online fall semester, the zoom lectures start at 9:30 and go until 12:20. It's very long and painful. There are a lot of break out room and activities.

Catherine is FANTASTIC! She really wants you to succeed, which is obvious by the fact that she gives you the opportunity to submit a practice midterm and get feedback on it. She replies to emails within hours, and it always willing to help. Shes hilarious, kind, knowledgeable, and punctual. All in all a great prof.

Use the vocabulary from class in all your papers and you'll get a better mark. Don't leave book report until the last minute because she'll even look over it and give feedback if you're done earlier. Do a couple practice midterms and finals and have her look over them, very helpful. Lovely lady who wants you to succeed, so visit her office hours.
